days.title: Programming and Emotion
days.content: A video from freelance web developer Peter Fisher on programming and emotion.

days.title: Creating a modal in JavaScript and CSS
days.content: Instructions on how to create a modal in JavaScript and CSS without using a framework.

days.title: Reading a local JSON file in JavaScript
days.content: How to use XMLHttpRequest to read a local JSON file in JavaScript

days.title: How to use cURL in PHP to extract data from a web page
days.content: An article and video on how to use cURL functionality in PHP to automate extracting data from a web page.

days.title: Unit Testing in PHP
days.content: A video explaining Unit Testing in PHP using PHPUnit. This is the first video in a series of ten.

days.title: First Steps in Z80 Assembly Language
days.content: A guide to taking your first steps in Z80 assembly language by Darryl Sloan. A four part series with code, explaining how to code using the Z80 processor.

days.title: JavaScript ES6 Arrow Functions
days.content: Peter Fisher explains how to use JavaScript ES6 arrow functions.

days.title: Old is the New New
days.content: Talk from Kevlin Henney on how many seemingly new programming approaches were discovered decades ago.

days.title: Losing motivation
days.content: Video from MPJ of FunFunFunction on losing motivation.

days.title: Copying Text to the Clipboard using JavaScript.
days.content: Example code on how to copy text to the clipboard using JavaScript.

days.title: Coders are Herd Animals
days.content: Video from MPJ of FunFunFunction on on why Coders are herd animals.

days.title: Outdated UX Patterns and Alternatives
days.content: Article explaining a number of outdated UX patterns with suggestions for better alternatives.

days.title: Should I Use a Carousel?
days.content: A website dedicated to the question 'Should I use a carousel?'.

days.title: The Growth Stages of a Programmer
days.content: In this video, MPJ explains the growth stages of a programmer.

days.title: Cutting Corners in Web Development
days.content: A video from freelance web developer Peter Fisher on cutting corners in web development and why some corners should never be cut.

days.title: Present & Correct
days.content: Art and design blog. An inspirational site for retro design and colours. Also sells stationery and office objects

days.title: PDO Tutorial
days.content: An in-depth PDO tutorial by PHPDelusions.

days.title: Sprite Animation in JavaScript using Canvas
days.content: A tutorial on how to create a sprite animation in HTML5 and JavaScript using Canvas.

days.title: 25 Years of PHP
days.content: A talk on 25 years of PHP, by its creator Rasmus Lerdorf.

days.title: Finding the Browser Width in JavaScript
days.content: Article on how to get the width of the browser in vanilla JavaScript.

days.title: Sending Email using PHP
days.content: How to send email using PHP. Example code shown for sending in text and HTML format. Also demonstrates how to send email with attachments.

days.title: How to Learn to Code Fast
days.content: Peter Fisher breaks down the truth on learning programming and the quest for tutorials on 'How to learn to code fast'.

days.title: Bruce Lee on Programming
days.content: A talk on Bruce Lee's philosophy on programming by Speaker Tony Van Eerd.

days.title: You Will Never Learn Everything
days.content: Coding advice from Peter Fisher on why you will never learn everything in web development.
